meanings: be[get] flustered, be in a flurry
be flurried[fluttered, flustered], be thrown into confusion, rush about madly

examples.korean: She tends to get flustered when boys are around. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 주위에 남자아이들이 있으면 허둥대는 경향을 보인다. English Hidden Card
